articles.title: Former cricketer Andrew Symonds dies in car accident
articles.description: Former Australian test cricketer Andrew Symonds has died after a single-vehicle car accident near Townsville in northeast Australia. He was 46.
articles.content:
Former Australian test cricketer Andrew Symonds has died after a single-vehicle car accident near Townsville in northeast Australia. He was 46.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Former Australian cricketer Andrew Symonds killed in car crash
articles.description: The former test cricket all-rounder was killed in a single-vehicle crash outside Townsville on Saturday night.
articles.content:
Former Australian cricket star Andrew Symonds has died in a single-vehicle car crash in North Queensland,police say.
The former test cricket all-rounder was killed in the accident on Saturday night,… [+335 chars]

articles.title: CSA responds to 'speculation' on Mark Boucher's future, backs him to continue as Proteas coach
articles.description: Cricket South Africa released a statement on Saturday evening reaffirming its support for Proteas coach Mark Boucher.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa has released a statement in which it backs Mark Boucher to continue as Proteas head coach.

articles.title: Shane Warne memorial - watch & follow updates

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
